thread.title: QUIZ: Can You Guess The K-Drama Based On These Poorly Explained Plots?
thread.title_full: QUIZ: Can You Guess The K-Drama Based On These Poorly Explained Plots?

author: autumn93
title: QUIZ: Can You Guess The K-Drama Based On These Poorly Explained Plots?
text:
Pin   
Are you an avid drama watcher? Take this quiz of completely random and poorly written drama descriptions to see how well you know your dramas! Soompiers, how well did you do? Let us know in the comments below! 
autumn93 is a lifelong asiandramaholic; she actually can’t remember a time when she hasn’t been drunk off of dramas. It’s a real and serious problem. Doctors are still struggling to find a cure. Besides dramas, she also happens to enjoy food and Twitter .
